title: Creating a reading list of articles on multimodal machine learning with heterogeneous data sources involves selecting papers that cover foundational concepts, recent advancements, and diverse applications. Here’s a list of 20 articles up to 2022 that you might find useful
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** by Tadas Baltrušaitis, Chaitanya Ahuja, and Louis-Philippe Morency
This paper provides a comprehensive survey of the field, including challenges and taxonomy
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"** by Hao Wang, Dit-Yan Yeung
This article reviews deep learning approaches for multimodal representation learning
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** by Amir Zadeh et al
This paper discusses sentiment analysis using multimodal data
**"Learning Multimodal Representations Using Deep Canonical Correlation Analysis"** by Galen Andrew et al
This work introduces a method for learning multimodal representations
**"Multimodal Deep Learning"** by Ngiam et al
This foundational paper explores deep learning techniques for multimodal data
**"Co-attention Memory Networks for Multimodal Sentiment Analysis"** by Peng Zhou et al
This paper presents a novel approach using co-attention mechanisms
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** by Tadas Baltrušaitis et al
An updated survey on the challenges and methods in multimodal machine learning
**"Multimodal Transformer for Unaligned Multimodal Language Sequences"** by Yao-Hung Hubert Tsai et al
This paper introduces a transformer-based model for multimodal data
**"Multimodal Variational Autoencoder: A Deep Generative Model for Heterogeneous Data"** by Shengjia Zhao et al
This work discusses a generative model for multimodal data
This paper explores language models that incorporate visual data
**"Multimodal Fusion with Deep Neural Networks for Audio-Visual Emotion Recognition"** by Amir Zadeh et al
This article focuses on emotion recognition using audio-visual data
**"Multimodal Learning with Deep Boltzmann Machines"** by Nitish Srivastava and Ruslan Salakhutdinov
This paper introduces a model for learning from multimodal data
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis with Word-Level Fusion and Reinforcement Learning"** by Soujanya Poria et al
This work presents a novel fusion technique for sentiment analysis
**"Multimodal Speech Emotion Recognition Using Audio and Text"** by Yoon et al
This paper discusses emotion recognition using both audio and text data
**"Multimodal Learning for Video Classification"** by Andrej Karpathy et al
This article explores video classification using multimodal data
**"Multimodal Generative Adversarial Network for Multimodal Image Super-Resolution"** by Xinyi Yu et al
This paper introduces a GAN-based approach for image super-resolution
**"Multimodal End-to-End Sparse Model for Emotion Recognition"** by Amir Zadeh et al
This work presents a sparse model for emotion recognition
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Automated ICD Coding"** by Fei Li et al
This paper discusses the use of multimodal data for medical coding
**"Multimodal Learning with Transformers: A Survey"** by Hao Zhang et al
This survey covers the use of transformers in multimodal learning
**"Multimodal Few-Shot Learning with Frozen Language Models"** by Maria Tsimpoukelli et al
This paper explores few-shot learning using multimodal data

These articles cover a range of topics within multimodal machine learning, including foundational methods, recent advancements, and specific applications. They should provide a solid foundation for understanding the field and its current trends
